schema:composer.rdfs:comment: The person or organization who wrote a composition, or who is the composer of a work performed at some event.
schema:composer.rdfs:label: composer

schema:firstPerformance.rdfs:comment: The date and place the work was first performed.
schema:firstPerformance.rdfs:label: firstPerformance

schema:includedComposition.rdfs:comment: Smaller compositions included in this work (e.g. a movement in a symphony).
schema:includedComposition.rdfs:label: includedComposition

schema:iswcCode.rdfs:comment: The International Standard Musical Work Code for the composition.
schema:iswcCode.rdfs:label: iswcCode

schema:lyricist.rdfs:comment: The person who wrote the words.
schema:lyricist.rdfs:label: lyricist

schema:musicArrangement.rdfs:comment: An arrangement derived from the composition.
schema:musicArrangement.rdfs:label: musicArrangement

schema:musicCompositionForm.rdfs:comment: The type of composition (e.g. overture, sonata, symphony, etc.).
schema:musicCompositionForm.rdfs:label: musicCompositionForm

schema:musicalKey.rdfs:comment: The key, mode, or scale this composition uses.
schema:musicalKey.rdfs:label: musicalKey

schema:recordedAs.rdfs:comment: An audio recording of the work.
schema:recordedAs.rdfs:label: recordedAs
